title: Eleanor of Aquitaine - LIES - Extra History

media:group.media:title: Eleanor of Aquitaine - LIES - Extra History
media:group.media:description:
Welcome Extra Historians to Lies, where we talk about the mistakes we made and the details we couldn't quite squeeze into our Eleanor of Aquitaine Series. With questions like, Why wasn't Eleanor in the Robin Hood stories? Did Eleanor really dress as an amazon during the Crusade? And Why were there so many odd deaths like tripping over a pig during this time period?

---- Recommended Reading ---- (Book Links on Patreon)
Eleanor of Aquitaine: A Life by Alison Weir
The Plantagenets: The Warrior Kings and Queens Who Made England by Dan Jones
Eleanor of Aquitaine: Queen of France and England, Mother of Empires by Sara Cockerill
The Great Courses has a great series of lectures called Medieval Heroines in History and Legend by Doctor Bonnie Wheeler that has five lectures on Eleanor.
